name: Kojima's Day Out
description:
W-A-D-S = Movement

Spacebar = Codec

Esc = Quit (I think)

Plays as Kojima as he battles his way to give an interview to the Giant Bomb crew.

Press the Spacebar for the codec, move around and try it with the objects in the room.

This is an unfinished mess.

- 1gorebash1
